Author: rail
Name: AetherDraw
Description: Draw strategy images for encounters. Use /aetherdraw to open. Supports live collaboration.
Changelog:
v2.2.1.0: Fixed numerous crashes and rendering issues related to raidplan.io imports, including background image scaling and icon layering.
v2.2.0.0: Added limit cut 1-8 dots. Added raidplan.io url imports.
